title: Google: No plans to become a carmaker
content:
05:22 GMT 
 
FRANKFURT: Google Inc does not intend to become a vehicle manufacturer, the company's managing director for Germany, Austria and Switzerland said at the Frankfurt auto show.
                      Google has named auto industry veteran John Krafcik, a former CEO of Hyundai Motors America, as chief executive of its self-driving car project.
                      Google's pet project of driverless cars started in 2009  …
